layout.title: Categories - Grid Layout
layout.message: Displays a list of categories in Grid layout

field.name: id
field.label: Category
field.description: Choose the category which you want to list it's sub categories

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: If you select some categories here, only these selected categories will be displayed

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: If you don't want certain categories being displayed on this menu item, select these categories here

field.name: hide_children_categories
field.label: Hide Children Categories
field.description: Determine whether children categories will be displayed on category page when users access to a category from this menu item

field.name: hide_children_events
field.label: Hide Children Events
field.description: Determine whether children events will be displayed on category page when users access to a category from this menu item

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed above list of categories

field.name: number_columns
field.label: Number Columns
field.description: Choose Number Columns which will be used to display categories

field.name: enable_hover_effect
field.label: Enable Hover Effect
field.description: Set to Yes will apply a nice effect when users hover over a category.

field.name: hover_bg_color
field.label: Hover Background Color
field.description: Leave it empty to use default color

field.name: hover_color
field.label: Hover Text Color
field.description: Leave it empty to use default color
